# python-androidtv

`androidtv` is a Python 3 package that provides state information and some control of an Android TV device over a network. This is achieved via ADB.


## Installation

Be sure you install into a Python 3.x environment.

`pip install androidtv`


## Acknowledgments

This is based on [python-firetv](https://github.com/happyleavesaoc/python-firetv) by happyleavesaoc and the [androidtv component for Home Assistant](https://github.com/a1ex4/home-assistant/blob/androidtv/homeassistant/components/media_player/androidtv.py) by a1ex4, and it depends on [python-adb](https://github.com/google/python-adb) and [pure-python-adb](https://github.com/Swind/pure-python-adb).
